title: Memory Forensics with Volatility
description: Analyze a memory dump to find traces of a compromise and extract the hidden flag.
hints: Start by listing the processes running at the time of the dump.
Check for any unusual or hidden processes.
Look for any strings that might indicate a flag hidden in memory.
learningObjectives: Understand the basics of memory forensics
Use Volatility to identify and analyze suspicious activities
Practice extracting information from a memory dump
